alert.note: Alert for Butler; Logan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 10:20AM EDT until June 17 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Logan County in south central Kentucky... Southwestern Butler County in south central Kentucky... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 920 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dunmor, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Logan and southwestern Butler Counties, including the following locations... Insco, Gordonsville, Dimple, Spa, Epleys, Leetown, Dennis, Wolf Lick, Crossroad and Buffalo Fork. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
